issue.title: [Python][Parquet] Expose EngineVersion in python arrow reader properties
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9767](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9767). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Probably also pays to have the default selectable by environment variable.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9767?focusedCommentId=17194051) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield@gmail.com):*
We are going to replace code instead of toggling version.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9767?focusedCommentId=17586024) by @toddfarmer:*
Transitioning issue from Resolved to Closed to based on resolution field value.
